articles.title: What mistakes did Lakshya Sen do in the defeat to Kunlavut Vitidsarn in Thailand Open semifinal? - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Indian started well, fought hard in the second set, hung on till 11-11 in the decider before losing the plot.
articles.content: Lakshya Sen didn’t play badly at all, but he lacked the composure at the finish, where his wild hitting proved to be his undoing. Sen lost the Thailand Open semifinals to local favourite and second s… [+2329 chars]
